statements: SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE treatment_outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_date FROM PatientData WHERE hospital_id = 12345 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcome FROM PatientData WHERE performance_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM PatientData WHERE hospital_id = 54321;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE hospital_id = 1 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcome FROM PatientData WHERE performance_rating > 4.0
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcome, performance_rating FROM PatientData WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE treatment_outcome LIKE '%Positive%'
SELECT DISTINCT hospital_id FROM PatientData ORDER BY hospital_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_location = 'New York'
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_outcome = 'Successful'
SELECT patient_name, patient_location FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_location FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_date, t.treatment_description FROM Patients p JOIN Treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE t.treatment_outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(patient_age) AS avg_age FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patients WHERE admission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_cost FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_cost DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_value < 1000;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_cost > 1000 AND treatment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY treatment_cost ASC;

SELECT patient_name, COUNT(treatment_id) AS num_treatments FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING num_treatments > 2 ORDER BY num_treatments DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM Patients WHERE admission_date < '2022-01-01' AND discharge_date IS NULL ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value, MONTH(metric_date) AS month FROM PerformanceMetrics GROUP BY month ORDER BY avg_metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT diagnosis_name FROM Diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_name, treatment_description FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT diagnosis_name, COUNT(*) FROM Diagnoses GROUP BY diagnosis_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) FROM HospitalMetrics GROUP BY metric_name ORDER BY AVG(metric_value) DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hospitals;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT admission_id, admission_date, admission_type FROM Admissions WHERE admission_type = 'Emergency';
SELECT hospital_name, location, ratings FROM Hospitals ORDER BY ratings DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_cost FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_cost > 500;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT Patients.name, Treatments.treatment_name, Treatments.treatment_cost FROM Patients INNER JOIN Treatments ON Patients.id = Treatments.patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT hospital_name, location, ratings FROM Hospitals WHERE ratings > 4;
